      • buildRunningDataDTO

        protected RunningDataDTO buildRunningDataDTO(Game game,
                                             boolean isCurrentTeam)
        Builds a RunningDataDTO from current game information. If isCurrentTeam is true, category is omitted.
        Parameters:
        isCurrentTeam - true when building for currently guessing team, else false.
        Returns:
        a correct RunningDataDTO

      • buildStateUpdate

        public StateUpdateDTO buildStateUpdate(Game game)
        Method that builds a StateUpdateDTO from current game information. If game is active, waiting information gets omitted and vice versa.
        Returns:
        a correct StateUpdateDTO
